~ Codes for version 1.1.2 ~
By Skoolzout1


==========================================================================================
**The codes listed here are the codes that changed between this version of the game and the
previous version, so if a code isnt here, it means the old versions code still works**
 
I will also not be putting as much (if any) effort on describing how to use these codes,
since the instructions can still be found on the old versions code. However,any changes to instructions
or if i add any new codes, they will have instructions written here instead.
 
Fast Forward/Rewind time (ZL + Dpadleft = -1hr, ZL+dpadRight = +1hr)
30000000 407B3AF4
10000000 50000000
31000000 000000A8
03010000 1127115E
00000480 00000000
12100000 00000000
15040000 40F00000
13100000 00000004
D0000000 DEADCAFE
03010000 1127115E
00000880 00000000
12100000 00000000
15050000 40F00000
13100000 00000004
D0000000 DEADCAFE
 
 
Freeze Time to a specific Time
00020000 407B3A5C
XXXXXXXX 00000000
*replace X's with desired time
3f800000 = 12am
42980000 = 5am
43080000 = 9am
43340000 = 12pm
43800000 = 5pm
439E0000 = 9pm
 
Lightning targets around Link
30000000 439C0794
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
12100000 00000000
12100001 00000004
12100002 00000008
30000000 407ABC04
10000000 50000000
31000000 000002E0
13100000 00000000
13100001 00000004
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
 
Rapid Fire Lightning
03020000 407B602C
00000000 00000000
00020000 407B602C
00000005 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
 
Press Dpad Down to Spawn Lightning
03010000 1127115E
00000100 00000000
00020000 407B602C
00000002 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
 
Generate a Random Direction of Wind Current At your location
00020000 407B6160
XXXXXXXX 00000000
*replace X's with value
3F800000 = no wind.
40000000 = some wind
41000000 = strong wind
42000000 = super strong wind

Current Weapon Size Mod
00020000 4C000400
XXXXXXXX 00000000
30000000 45188784
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000040
30100000 00000000
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000990
12000000 4C000400
13100000 00000000
13100000 00000004
13100000 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Replace X's in Line2 with Desired size amount
3F800000 = Normal Size
40000000 = 2x as big
40400000 = 3x as big
40800000 = 4x as big
41000000 = 8x as big

13100000 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Replace X's Just like with weapon size mod

Armour Modifier
00000000 43AB7EF7
000000XX 00000000
*change X's to your desired armour rating in hex, (FF would be an armour rating of 255)

90C40070 90C40074
90C40078 D1440000
D1640004 D1840008
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420

Game Speed Modifier [skoolzout1]
00020000 4C000700
XXXXXXX 00000000
C000000A 60000000
7DEF7A78 7C631A78
7C842278 3C603FBF
6063A698 3C800100
3DE04C00 61EF0700
81EF0000 90830000
91E30004 91E30008
9083000C 91E30010
91E30014 60000000
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420
Replace the X's in the second line with the desired game speed.
3F800000 = Normal Speed
3F000000 = 0.5 speed
3E800000 = 0.25 speed
3D4CCCCD = 0.05 speed
000000000 = about 0.05 speed as well. There is a cap to how slow it will go with this method
Speed cannot be greater than 1.0 using this method
 
Weather/Skybox Modifier
00020000 407B5CF0
XXXXXXXX 00000000
*Replace X's with desired weather effect
01030002 = cloudy
03010002 = dark rainy
00010002 = sunny
07000007 = lightning (only the rain and thunder sounds)
05000007 = fog and snows (effects only)
 
Elemental Weapons are Always Fully Charged
C0000011 60000000
7C210A78 7C421278
7C631A78 7C842278
3C204518 60218784
3C4045BB 60428000
3C604000 3C804C00
80210000 7C011800
41800044 7C012000
4181003C 38210040
80210000 7C011800
4180002C 7C012000
41810024 38210970
80210000 7C011800
41800014 7C012000
4181000C 3821000C
90410000 60000000
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420
 
Infinite Arrows
C000001C 60000000
7C210A78 7C421278
7C631A78 7C842278
7CA52A78 7CC63278
7CE73A78 7D084278
7D294A78 3C204407
602107E4 3C401127
6042115E A0420000
60A503E7 3C604C00
60630B00 A0810000
2C040100 40820050
2C020800 40820048
3821006C 80C10000
7C064800 41820014
90C30004 38210004
38630004 4BFFFFE8
7C631A78 3C604C00
60630B04 80E30000
7C074800 41820040
7CC63278 60C60001
90C3FFFC 7C631A78
3C604C00 60630B04
80E3FFFC 2C070001
4082001C 81030000
7C084800 41820010
90A80010 38630004
4BFFFFEC 60000000
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420
Pull out your bow, then bring up the Arrow selection menu to activate code.
 
Every Night is a BloodMoon
00000000 3FF765B3
00000001 00000000
*in order to turn off this code, you need to run the code below for a second
and then you can turn it off.
 
Never a BloodMoon
00000000 3FF765B3
00000000 00000000
 
Location Spoofer (Gamepad)[skoolzout1]
03010000 1127115E
00001010 00000000
00020000 4C000C8C
00000001 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
03010000 1127115E
00008010 00000000
00020000 4C000C8C
00000000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
C0000015 60000000
7C210A78 7C631A78
7C842278 7CA52A78
7CE73A78 7D084278
3CE01100 3D001200
3C80439C 60840794
80840000 7C043800
41800060 7C044000
41810058 38840140
3C204C00 60210C80
3C60439B 6063F870
80A1000C 2C050001
41820020 C1440000
C1640004 C1840008
D1410000 D1610004
D1810008 4800001C
C1410000 C1610004
C1810008 D1430000
D1630004 D1830008
60000000 60000000
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420
Press R+X to Freeze your fake location where you're standing
Press R+A to Restore Normal Coordinate tracking
- This essentially elimates coordinate based Cutscene triggers
 
Location Spoofer (Pro Controller)[skoolzout1]
03010000 112671AA
00000208 00000000
00020000 4C000C8C
00000210 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
03010000 112671AA
00008010 00000000
00020000 4C000C8C
00000000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE

7C842278 7CA52A78
7CE73A78 7D084278

3C80439C 60840794
80840000 7C043800
41800060 7C044000
41810058 38840140
3C204C00 60210C80
3C60439B 6063F870
80A1000C 2C050001
41820020 C1440000
C1640004 C1840008
D1410000 D1610004
D1810008 4800001C
C1410000 C1610004
C1810008 D1430000
D1630004 D1830008

3C40010F 60426AE0

*Same instructions as Gamepad Version
 
Warp Horse to Link (Gamepad)
03010000 1127115E
00000100 00000000
30000000 439C0794
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
12100000 00000000
12100001 00000004
12100002 00000008
30000000 439BCBB8
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000008
30100000 00000000
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
13100000 00000000
13100001 00000004
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Press DpadDown to warp them to you. They MUST be able to be Hear you in order for it to work.
This is because Horses only warp the second the start to move. so they have to hear you whistle.
also only works if youve ridden your horse at least once recently.
[[0x439BCBB8] + 0x8] + 0x140 - Horse Coords
 
Dpad Down to Warp Onto Horse (Gamepad)
03010000 1127115E
00000100 00000000
12000000 3FF70438
12000001 3FF7043C
12000002 3FF70440
15040100 3F800000
30000000 439C0794
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
13100000 00000000
13100001 00000004
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Works anywhere. DO NOT USE if you dont have an active horse.
 
 
Dpad Down to Warp Onto Horse (Pro Controller)
03010000 112671AA
00004000 00000000
12000000 3FF70438
12000001 3FF7043C
12000002 3FF70440
15040100 3F800000
30000000 439C0794
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
13100000 00000000
13100001 00000004
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Works anywhere. DO NOT USE if you dont have an active horse.
 
Warp Horse to Link (Pro Controller)
03010000 112671AA
00004000 00000000
30000000 439C0794
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
12100000 00000000
12100001 00000004
12100002 00000008
30000000 439BCBB8
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000008
30100000 00000000
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
13100000 00000000
13100001 00000004
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Press DpadDown to warp them to you. They MUST be able to be Hear you in order for it to work.
This is because Horses only warp the second the start to move. so they have to hear you whistle.
also only works if youve ridden your horse at least once recently.
[[0x439BCBB8] + 0x8] + 0x140 - Horse Coords
 
 
Some of the Visual Effects listed at the Bottom in 1.1.1 have shifted by +0xC, but some havent. since there are so many and not many people will even use them i figured id just leave them off this list
==========================================================================================
